name: Meme Bird
description:
This is a clone of the game Flappy Bird,So calm down.

Oh, and BTW it's my first game so it's not going to be the best.

This is a game like Flappy Bird but with a twist........THERE'S MEMES!!!!

FEATURES!!!

  • It's a game like Flappy Bird but with memes.
  • You get to play as a flying Sponge Bob......How fucking cool is that!!!.
  • There's dead and lit memes in the game soooo GO PLAY IT NOW!!!.
  • It's an endless game That's cool right ?!?! RIGHT !?!

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

You can literally play it in a fucking POTATO!!

And last but not least Please give me feedback ;-; Please...
